items.title: CloudThinker - Intelligent Cloud Operations
items.description: Co-Founder and Architect. Multi-agent orchestration platform leveraging Amazon Bedrock for autonomous cloud operations and compliance monitoring across AWS, Azure, and GCP. Results: 35-40% operational efficiency improvement; 50% reduction in mean time to recovery.

items.title: AWS First GenAI Journey
items.description: Lead Technical Contributor. Principal architect of AWS official Generative AI reference framework. Designed 20+ enterprise architectures for LLM and RAG systems using Amazon Bedrock, SageMaker, Lambda, and OpenSearch. Results: 1,000+ GitHub stars; 3,000+ forks; adopted as regional reference by AWS Partner Network.

items.title: Chubb AWS Enterprise Migration
items.description: Migration Architect. Led migration of 100+ banking workloads to AWS using MAP methodology. Designed multi-account landing zone with centralized governance using Terraform IaC. Results: 20% cost reduction; 30% compliance efficiency improvement; zero-downtime execution; $5M in operational savings.

items.title: Special Force LMS
items.description: Learning management system serving 40K+ users for AWS certification preparation and cloud training.
